title: ‘I asked Torsten Træn to go in the break for my fantasy team’: Riders relax and have fun on ‘boring Tour de France stage
content:
Americans catch up on Independence Day, and Cosnefroy talks to the camera-man while up the road as slow stage 4 recalls how the Tour used to be.

Read the full article at ‘I asked Torsten Træn to go in the break for my fantasy team’: Riders relax and have fun on ‘boring Tour de France stage on Velo.
